strings.v: Abomination lets loose his rage and unleashes a savage beatdown on his opponent.
What the Abomination hits into the air, the Abomination hits back down.
Two acrobatic strikes, followed by a punishing barrage from Agent Venom’s twin SMGs. Dodge this!
Thermite, one of the US's most devastating grenades, thrown by a Symbiotic appendage at extreme velocity.
With two well-placed webshots, Flash keeps his target still while he unloads six clips into them.
Angela unleashes powerful series of strikes with her sword Xiphos.
Angela dashes forward to employ the Blades separated, before combining them to strike again.
Angela strikes with the Sword of the Stars forcing her opponent back, before drawing the Blades of Ichor to finish them.
With the help of his Pym Particles, Ant-Man delivers a micro-sized uppercut punch.
Ant-Man launches a swarm of angry bullet ants to eat away at his opponent. Millions of tiny ants leads to millions of tiny stings.
With an extra potent dose of Pym Particles, Ant-Man delivers a combo of miniature knockout punches.
Archangel fires several of his razor edged metallic feathers, coated with his potent neurotoxin.
Archangel uses all six of his limbs in a flurry of razor sharp blows.
Archangel emits an intense high pitched shriek, stunning his opponent, creating an opening for a series of high speed strikes!
Beast uses a freestyle form of combat, striking the opponent with multiple kicks.
Making full use of his great strength and agility, Beast performs a series of acrobatic kicks to knockdown the opponent.
Beast taps into his animalistic instincts and temporarily unleashes a savage attack on unsuspecting opponents
Channeling unknown particles through the antenna on his forehead, Black Bolt targets his opponent with a focused beam.
Surrounded by anti-gravitons, Black Bolt flies into his opponents, forcing them back with multiple strikes.
Black Bolt's power is so immense that a mere whisper is enough to send his enemies into submission.
The rage of Black Panther is released with calculated prowess.
Calling upon his sacred powers as chieftain of the Wakandan Panther Clan, T'Challa unleashes a flurry of attacks.
The King of Wakanda proves his strength to all that might disbelieve his power.
Calling upon the spirits of his ancestors grants strength for swift and powerful blows.
Pinpoint strikes weaken his foes, then T'Challa strikes hard to bring down the enemy of Wakanda.
Agent Romanova delivers a tactical series of strikes she first learned at the Black Widow Ops program.
Black Widow displays the agility and grace of a ballerina, with the precision and devastation of a ninja.
She may look harmless enough, but this Black Widow has a shocking bite.
Doctor Voodoo calls upon the Loa who poison his target's beneficial magics.
Doctor Voodoo requests aid from the spirit realm, and the Loa answer, granting him strength or sapping it from his enemy.
Doctor Voodoo calls to his patron Papa Legba, who throws open the gate to the Spirit Realm.
Cable knocks back his opponent, making space to use his plasma rifle.
A telekinetic wave, followed up by a high energy charged blast from his rifle.
Cable uses his powers to enhance his plasma rifle, locks on his target, and unleashes a withering barrage of firepower.
Cap puts his weight behind a hefty shield bash.
A staple of the Cap repertoire, his shield strikes true and through.
An up-close and personal view of Cap's shield. Don't blink, or you'll miss it.
Cap puts his weight behind a hefty shield bash.
A staple of the Cap repertoire, his shield strikes true and through.
An up-close and personal view of Cap's shield. Don't blink, or you'll miss it.
A powerful beam of cosmic energy blasts all in its path.
Captain Marvel delivers a massive kick with galactic grace.
Charging to maximum power levels, Captain Marvel releases concussive energy bursts from her hands.
I must end it at any cost.

A classic wrestling move used to knock down any opponent.
Colossus demonstrates hand to hand combat with enough superhuman strength to careen 100 tons.
In flesh form he is a man; in steel form he is a hero, increasing his damage based on his current Armor level.

With a special mix of incendiary rounds, let them burn.
It's time to make them pay for what they've done.
Cyclops uses his Ruby-Quartz visor to focus a beam of energy.
Two rage-fueled punches and a kick daze the opponent long enough for Cylops' Optic Blast to teach them a lesson.
Scott Summers briefly loses control, allowing his Optic Blast to reach gigawatt levels. He'll be the only witness.

Two rage-fueled punches and a kick daze the opponent long enough for Cylops' Optic Blast to teach them a lesson.
Scott Summers briefly loses control, allowing his Optic Blast to reach gigawatt levels. He'll be the only witness.
Matt Murdock has mastered hand-to-hand combat thanks to his early and intense training by the martial arts master Stick!
Three classic kicks with acrobatic guile.
Daredevil enters a heightened state of 360° awareness, evading all attacks and countering with strikes to enemy pressure points.
With honed precision and grace, Murdock delivers a perfectly placed kick to his foe, striking with decisive justice.
Three swift kicks, delivered with lethal precision and preternatural speed.
Daredevil enters a heightened state of 360° awareness, evading all attacks and countering with strikes to enemy pressure points.
A fancy way to punch someone where it counts.
It's an attack with TWO swords – oh, and there's an awesome spin...and two swords!
A fancy way to punch a certain someone where it counts.
It's an attack with TWO swords – and there's an awesome spin...and two swords!
A humble beginning to any wizard's duel.
Dr. Strange orchestrates three Flames of the Faltines in a fiery symphony.
For his final act, Dr. Stephen Strange demonstrates sorcery supremacy – making his opponent disappear.
A wave of power from the Dark Dimension burns through his opponent’s very soul, burning out any sources of power it may find.
Dormammu opens rifts to the Dark Dimension, drawing forth bolts of raw power.
Dormammu brings his opponent into the Dark Dimension for a demonstration of his true potential.
A savage headbutt from Drax, sure to crack some skulls.
Drax demonstrates mastery of Dwi Theet martial arts with dual knives. Hope you like a close shave.
Rage consumes Drax, as he slices and kicks with unmatched power.
A humble beginning to any wizard's duel.

For his final act, Dr. Stephen Strange demonstrates sorcery supremacy – making his opponent disappear.

For his final act, Dr. Stephen Strange demonstrates sorcery supremacy – making his opponent disappear.
Electro releases an electrostatic bolt from his fingertips.
Electricity writhes along the arena floor in a high-voltage wave of destruction.
Storing over a million volts, Maxwell Dillon embodies electricity itself to wreak havoc on his opponent.
Elektra, master of ninjitsu, lets fly two deadly shuriken, striking with blinding speed and precision.
Elektra launches a flurry of blows, striking with her sai and katana in a graceful and powerful combo.
Calling upon her extremely honed skills in ninjitsu and assassination, Elektra delivers a string of powerful and precise strikes to bring down her target.
With a quick jet blast, Falcon kicks his foe, then lets loose a barrage from his twin SMGs.
Guided by Redwing's recon, Falcon dives in on his target for a massive strike.
Calling in a strafing run. Firing guided missiles. Target down.
With a little sleight of hand, the Ragin’ Cajun sends a hidden ace flying.
Super-charged staff strikes from the back alleys of N’awlins.
With quick movements, Gambit lets fly a perfect hand. Au Revoir.
One strike at opponents' vitals from the most dangerous woman in the galaxy.
A spinning sword attack slices twice at anything in Gamora's way.
Gamora's Godslayer blade tears her opponent apart in an acrobatic combination attack.
Supernatural strikes from weapons that slice, bludgeon and burn all at once.
Let fly fires so hot that they char the very soul.
Ghost Rider lets loose the Penance Stare to judge his opponent. But not before rapidly introducing them to his Hell Cycle.
Groot shows off his unique plant physiology to grow his limbs into the earth and surprise his foe.
Groot isn’t a terrible monster. He stomps his foot, then shows off his passive side.
When a gentle giant has had enough, he calls in a familiar furry face to lend a hand. Oh yeah!
The monarch of Planet X smashes his opponent into the unforgiving Earth with two mighty slams.
King Groot pours forth a toxic wave of plant-based venoms.
King Groot sends out his plant material to envelope his opponent and crush them.
Guided by the wisdom of those that came before, Guillotine strikes down her foe with a mighty cleaving blow.
Thrusting her bestowed blade into the earth, Guillotine strikes her opponent, then delivers a heavy overhead slash.
Even a killing blow may be an act of mercy.
Swords and guns! What more could you ask for?
Explosives strapped on a football, and kicked right at your opponent’s face! Catch!
In the immortal words of anyone about to do something really cool, that in no way could go horribly wrong!.
Hawkeye knocks the opponent back, then shoots them with an electromagnetic pulse.  Please taze me, Bro.
Hawkeye shows off by launching an explosive thermal-tipped arrow while upsidedown.
He didn't miss. You might think he did, but he didn't.
Reaching deep into his granted power, The Hood casts out an arc of chaotic lightning.
Calling forth his supernatural handguns, the Hood creates a bit of distance and empties the clips into his target.
Overwhelmed by the dark power inside him, Parker begins to transform into something else entirely.
“Let me introduce you to my fist!”
Smack your opponent around, then fire everything!
Eat this! Erm...maybe this!? Uhh...ramming speed!
A rocket-aided shoulder tackle smashes the armored suit through whatever, or whoever, happens to be in front of it.
An uppercut stuns the enemy, setting them up for a powerful Repulsor Ray blast.
The ultimate in Hulk-Busting technology showcases exactly what it can do.
Punch through their defenses. Shatter their formation.
Launch the assault. Leaving nothing for the enemy.
Hyperion fires beams of intense heat from his eyes to devesatating effect.
Using his massive strength Hyperion can exhale with the force of a hurricane.
Hyperion hammers his opponent into the ground, then launches himself into orbit, and uses gravity to smash back down on them with terrifying speed.
A quick blast of icy air to help the opponent cool off.
An icy blast to hold them in place just long enough to rain down icicles from above.
Iceman freezes his opponent in place before giving them the cold shoulder.
A powerful kick mastered from the teaching of Lei-Kung the Thunderer.
Danny Rand learned this powerful technique while training with the Immortal Weapons of the Seven Cities.
By focusing his Chi, Danny Rand unleashes the full power of the Iron Fist in a flurry of punches.
A powerful kick mastered from the teaching of Lei-Kung the Thunderer.
Danny Rand learned this powerful technique while training with the Immortal Weapons of the Seven Cities.
By focusing his Chi, Danny Rand unleashes the full power of the Iron Fist in a flurry of punches.
Iron Man sends his opponents flying with the reliable Repulsor Ray.
Iron Man takes flight and activates his chest-mounted Uni-Beam Projection Gun.
A rocket-boosted uppercut sends his opponent airborne, where they're subjected to an array of Iron Man's weaponry.
Iron Man sends his opponents flying with the reliable Repulsor Ray.
Iron Man takes flight and activates his chest-mounted Uni-Beam Projection Gun.
A rocket-boosted uppercut sends his opponent airborne, where they're subjected to an array of Iron Man's weaponry.
Blast the opponent with a powerful patriotic beam.
Iron Patriot sets a twisting collision course with his opponent.
The best defense, is a good... air strike! Overboard? Perhaps. Effective? Definitely!

JEAN_GREY unleashes a signature attack on their opponent.

First Mr. Fixit introduces you to his forehead, then he introduces you to one of his Chicago Typewriters. What a nice fellow.
With a stomp of his foot and a slap of his hands, Mr. Fixit sends two boulders slamming into his opponent’s head at high speed.
Joe Fixit lets loose a massive barrage from his twin Tommy Guns, then beats his opponent to a messy pulp with them. Never bet against the house.
Juggernaut smashes the ground, sending the opponent flying.
Juggernaut's devastating headbutt ripples through his opponent, shattering the ground below them.
Juggernaut uses the environment in more ways than one, with devastating results for opponents.
A concussive blast from the fingertips of Kang's gauntlets leave opponents in a daze.
Kang's Time-Ship blasts his opponent back to the future from a remote location using an electromagnetic pulse cannon.
Kang deploys a swarm of robotic drones from the future to seek and destroy his target.
Mordo launches an energy blast designed to use the attacker's energy against themselves.
Combining martial arts and black magic, Mordo strikes his opponent, causing them to momentarily have an out of body experience.

Upon entering the Mirror Dimension, Mordo is able to access all of his powers, shaping reality and catching the opponent off-guard right before the tendrils of an unidentified transdimentional beast drags them into a nightmare.
Create distance, then focus to see the flaws.
Through focus, understanding and strength, Karnak demonstrates his worlds philosophy.
All of humanity is as nothing. The universe will not notice when Karnak’s foe is no longer.
Loki slashes the opponent with his scepter, and then finishes them with a dark energy blast.
Loki taps into his Frost Giant lineage to overpower opponents with a surge of ice.
Loki manipulates the opponent into attacking his illusions until he is ready to deal the final blow.
Cage shows off some powerful moves taught to him by the Iron Fist himself.
Four strong hits give his opponent a bruisin'.
Trained in his youth by a gang called The Rivals, Luke Cage shows he's no creampuff.
Two ISO-infused blasts from his gauntlets, followed quickly by a massive blast from his armor.
Two swords from two powerful female warriors, now being used to cut down Maestro's foes.
For a brief time, Maestro lets his inner gamma-irradiated self loose. He smashes his opponent, then unleashes the full power of his ISO-Gauntlet.
Magik's Soulsword is forged from her own life force. One strike disrupts even the most powerful magic.
Appearing and disappearing by her will, the ethereal Soulsword severs the flow of Power within its target.
The Darkchilde's power mixes black and white magic, granting Illyana the power to transcend reality.
Sharp metal fragments are pulled from the surrounding environment and propelled across the arena.
Magneto expands his magnetic grasp deep under the arena, impaling his opponent with metal from below.
Encased in a metal prison, Magneto's target implodes. Peace was never an option.
Sharp metal fragments are pulled from the surrounding environment and propelled across the arena.
Magneto expands his magnetic grasp deep under the arena, impaling his opponent with jagged metal from below.

Marc Spector's two Crescent Darts increase in size from the opponent's perspective.
Bearing the mantle of the Moon-god Khonshu, Spector's staff brings two-handed justice.
The Moon's knight of vengeance hands down some serious discipline with years of training, years of practice, and mountains of self-restraint.
A powerful beam of cosmic energy blasts all in its path.
Ms. Marvel delivers a massive kick with galactic grace.
Charging to maximum power levels, Ms. Marvel releases concussive energy bursts from her hands.
With an upsize to her fists, Ms. Marvel delivers two unpleasant shots to the chops.
Ms. Marvel shows off her own version of Carol’s famous Cosmic Kick. But not before back-handing her opponent.
Coming in from the right! No, the left! Pow! Betcha didn’t see that coming.
Striking first with her electroshock batons, Nebula then forms them into a staff for a devastating second strike.
Nebula puts some space between her and her opponent before unleashing a concentrated burst of electricity.
Death by a thousand cuts, faster than you can bat an eye.
Let’s see what the amazing Nightcrawler learned during his time in the circus.
He’s coming in from every direction. Lieber Gott!
The Phoenix Force is released in a wave of telekinesis, amidst a rush of power!
Cosmic fire, funneled by raw Telekinetic power, into a deadly firestorm.
The power of the Phoenix Force unleashed!
Psylocke manifests a telekinetic blade, using it in tandem with her Katana.
Psylocke unleashes her Telepathic abilities in a blast of raw psionic energy.
Psylocke focuses all of her power into a single psychic blade, plunging into her opponent’s brain.
A ferocious punch, followed by three perfectly placed shots to put down the target.
Sawed off shotguns followed by a burst from twin submachine guns.
The Punisher shows why you should never break the law. Ever.
Quake quickly compresses the ground, launching a wave of earth towards the opponent.
Quake targets the ground with her vibrations to launch herself into the air and land a powerful punch.
Quake generates a powerful earthquake, opening the ground and trapping the opponent before she deals her final vibration pulse attack.
A signature attack is unleashed on the opponent.
A signature attack is unleashed on the opponent.
A signature attack is unleashed on the opponent.
When the Rhino puts his foot down, everyone listens.
Some heavy hits make mincemeat outta anyone.
He's Rhino. He knocks things down. That's what he does. That's who he is.
Three punches to that special place. Never doubt a raccoon.
Enough firepower to blow up a moon...at least, a moon in the Raccooniverse.
Rogue removes her gloves to absorb life energy, even against Blocking opponents.
With the incredible physical strength absorbed from Ms. Marvel, Rogue aims three powerful punches at the enemies' face.
Rogue initiates the attack by throwing the opponent into the air followed by aerial punches and a grand finale with her blowing a kiss towards the opponent.
Ronan releases the Power Cosmic through his Universal Weapon.
Ronan the Accuser pronounces his opponent guilty.
There will be no discussion, no debate. Ronan is the Supreme Accuser of the Kree Empire...and his opponent is the accused.
A concentrated sphere of Chaos Magic blasts Scarlet Witch's opponents.
Scarlet Witch sends her opponents flying with a bolt of Chaos Magic.
Scarlet Witch cuffs her foe into helplessness before crushing them with a bombardment of Hex Bolts.
A concentrated sphere of Chaos Magic blasts Scarlet Witch's opponents.
Scarlet Witch sends her opponents flying with a bolt of Chaos Magic.
Scarlet Witch calculates the mathematical probability to make happen whatever she wants. So watch out, because she's REALLY good at math!
She-hulk shows a strong objection to the opponent’s tactics, in the form of her heels leaving an imprint on their face.
For any defendant who disrespects the courtroom, She-Hulk provides a fitting punishment.
With a graceful, acrobatic display, Spider Gwen backflips away from her foe, focusing her Spider Sense in the process.
One backflip kick, two well placed web shots, and suddenly, Spider Gwen’s foot is rocketing towards her opponent’s face.
Gwen trips up her opponent, swings them around, and introduces them to the wall at an alarming speed. Fun for everyone.
When you have web in your eyes, you can't see punches coming.
Two feet in the face, courtesy of your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.
Like a streak of light, Spider-Man unleashes a powerful acrobatic assault.
With unlimited web from the symbiote suit, there's plenty to go around.
Two feet in the face, courtesy of your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.
The symbiote suit gives Spider-Man the strength to deliver more than just pizza.
Three well placed shots from a borrowed set of fantastic web shooters.
One punch, one roundhouse kick, one backflip kick, then a double dose of Venom Blast.
With a barrage of strikes, Morales does his best to earn the Spider-Man mantle.
What makes a kick to the face better? Rockets, and a little pelvic sorcery.
Star-Lord fires a shot from his Element Gun, but not before smacking his opponent in the face.
With heroism like this, soon everyone in the galaxy will know the name "Star-Lord".
Storm channels ambient electromagnetic energy into a single strike.
A gust of wind and blast of lightning send the opponent flying.
Storm channels the wrath of nature into a relentless tempest of wind, rain, and lightning that assault her opponent.

Two rapid and devastating cosmic blasts from the Mad Titan to soften up his opponent.
Rage and power combine to launch Thanos' target into the air with mighty concussive blasts.
With a heavy heart, Thanos prepares to introduce his foe to his one true love.
Bridging the heavens and Earth, Thor redirects a mighty bolt of lightning towards his opponent.
Nobody can outrun the mystical hammer Mjölnir.
Thor channels the powers of a God and strikes with Mjölnir using the strength of a thunderstorm.
Striking the earth with all her fury, Thor sends out a wave of summoned lightning through the ground.
With blinding speed and immense strength, Thor strikes her foe, then follows it up with a crushing blow from a lightning charged Mjölnir.
Thor unleashes the ferocity and anger of a God upon her foe, striking with devastating blows and fierce strikes of lightning and thunder.
A powerful blast to knock back any opponent foolish enough to be in its way.
You don't need advanced algorithms to understand what Ultron is communicating here.
Ultron believes that peace can only be achieved by eradicating humanity.

Venompool busts out his Symbiotic slapping appendage and gives a triple slap.
A sweet sword spinny attack, except now the swords are gigantic. Pause for sick dance moves!
“Deadpool you idiot! I’m calling Eddie and going back to him!”
Morphing his arm into a whip of constituent-matter, Venom lashes his target thrice.
Eight repeated strikes tear at opponents with tendril and claw.
Venom’s body writhes and mutates into a creature of nightmares as he plays a twisted game of hide-and-go-seek with his prey.
The Solar Jewel in Vision's forehead releases a concentrated beam of infrared radiation.
Vision increases the density of his fist, then smashes his opponent with full force, turning their own Power level against them.
Vision phases through the ground to deliver a surprise uppercut, followed by a close-range Infrared Beam.
The Mind Gem in Vision's forehead discharges a burst of powerful energy.
Vision increases the density of his fist, then smashes his opponent with full force, turning their own Power level against them.
Vision phases through the ground to deliver a surprise uppercut, followed by a close-range microwave burst of solar energy.
Firing his wrist-mounted minigun, War Machine bombards his opponent with over 250 rounds in less than 2 seconds
War Machine launches a Stark Industries heavy artillery shell from his trusted shoulder cannon.
War Machine lets fly everything he has, punishing his opponent with a massive barrage of .50 rounds, iron-clad punches, and a single high-explosive bunker buster artillery shell.
After a flurry of attacks, the Winter Soldier finishes off his opponent with a little help from his friends.
The Winter Soldier demonstrates a few tricks he learned from his days as Captain America's partner.
The Winter Soldier was once the greatest assassin the Red Army ever produced. Let him show you why.
Wolverine delivers a signature slash with unbreakable Adamantium claws.
No words, just teeth and claws.
Only two things are certain in life, an' this ain't taxes.
Wolverine delivers a signature slash with unbreakable Adamantium claws.
No words, just teeth and claws.
Only two things are certain in life, an' this ain't taxes.
One swift strike to disorient. One more to open veins and arteries.
Open the arteries. Go for the throat.
Trigger scent activated. Time to end this.
Sending extra power to the suit, Yellowjacket lets loose with a massive biosting energy blast.
Yellowjacket delivers a pair of heavy strikes to his opponent, then follows it up with a focused biosting blast.
With a blast of Pym Particles, Yellowjacket flies around his opponent at micro size, delivering a series of concentrated biostings.
One whistle, and Yondu's Yaka arrow pokes a hole right through you. Don't wait for the second whistle.
A strafing run from a Ravager M-Ship peppers the arena with Yondu's secret spice mix.
Yondu's Yaka Arrow is like a deadly snake as it mesmerizes, then strikes.
